title: How GameStop's Ryan Cohen became the 'meme king'
description: The CNBC Documentary "Making of the Meme King" is available on Peacock or streaming on CNBC.com.

title: GameStop fires CEO, names Ryan Cohen executive chairman; shares plummet
description: GameStop fired its CEO and appointed Ryan Cohen as executive chairman just months after the company reported its first quarterly profit in two years.

title: Instagram's algorithms are promoting accounts that share child sex abuse content, researchers find
description: An investigation published Wednesday described how Instagram's algorithms connect and promote accounts that facilitate and sell child sexual abuse material.

title: PGA Tour merger with LIV Golf triggers confusion about sponsorships, antitrust
description: The PGA Tour's announced merger with rival LIV Golf leaves questions surrounding the future of sponsorships and regulatory review.

title: New York-area flights delayed as Canada wildfire smoke cuts visibility
description: The FAA briefly halted flights bound for New York's LaGuardia Airport, and flights to Newark Liberty International Airport were slowed.

title: Boeing sued for allegedly stealing IP, counterfeiting tools used on NASA projects
description: Wilson Aerospace, a family-run tools company based in Colorado, is suing Boeing for a wide range of claims concerning allegedly stolen intellectual property.

title: Amazon is pursuing 'too many ideas' and needs to focus on best opportunities, analyst says in  letter to Jassy
description: Bernstein analysts published a report on Wednesday that they called an "open letter" to CEO Andy Jassy and the board, laying out the company's challenges.

title: Canadian wildfire smoke pushes NYC residents indoors, city briefly had world's worst air quality
description: New York City's air quality rating briefly ranked the worst of any city in the world on Tuesday, according to the IQAir World Air Quality Index.

title: CNN CEO Chris Licht out after Trump town hall fallout, brutal Atlantic article
description: Chris Licht is out at CNN after leading the news network for a little more than a year.

title: Oil giant Shell's UK ad campaign banned for being 'likely to mislead' consumers
description: Campaign group AdFree Cities said the ruling "sends a powerful message" to energy companies that greenwashing ad campaigns would no longer be tolerated.

title: PGA Tour-LIV Golf merger is a major win for the Saudis — and Americans are slamming it
description: U.S. lawmakers, commentators and sports fans are calling the deal "hypocritical" and accusing the PGA Tour of taking "Saudi blood money" and "sportswashing."

title: UK predicted to have the highest inflation rate out of all advanced economies this year
description: The U.K. is set to report a headline inflation of 6.9% this year, according to the OECD, marking the highest such level among all advanced economies.

title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk met with Mongolia's prime minister to discuss possible expansion
description: Mongolia's prime minister and Tesla CEO Elon Musk discussed possible expansion and investments into the country over a Monday virtual meeting.

title: More than 180 years of horse racing in Singapore is coming to an end
description: The Singapore Turf Club on Monday announced that it will hold its final race on October 2024, closing a 18-year-old chapter on horse racing.

title: Senegal, one of Africa's bastions of stability, faces its gravest threat of unrest in decades
description: The sentencing of a populist opposition leader in Senegal has triggered widespread unrest that threatens the West African country's long-established political stability.

title: 'Public nuisance': New York sues Hyundai and Kia, alleging their cars are easy to steal
description: A viral TikTok challenge started in 2021 and spurred a rise in thefts of Hyundai and Kia cars.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Troubled economies, calm markets
description: Despite stumbles in some big-name stocks yesterday, markets managed to climb as the uncertainty of previous weeks dissipated.

title: These economies benefited from Russia's isolation — but they now risk Western retaliation
description: Caucasus countries Georgia and Armenia, whose economies unexpectedly boomed in the wake of the war in Ukraine, are now facing a reckoning.

title: HSBC says rebranded Silicon Valley Bank UK will maintain startup focus while targeting global growth
description: Silicon Valley Bank UK will continue to serve startup businesses from "seed funding to IPO" after its takeover, the CEO of HSBC UK told CNBC.

title: China's exports plunge by 7.5% in May, far more than expected
description: China's exports fell in May for the first time since February, customs data showed Wednesday.

title: Australia's economy expands 2.3% in the first quarter, slowest growth in 1½ years
description: Early Wednesday morning, Reserve Bank of Australia Governor Philip Lowe delivered a speech at the Morgan Stanley Australia Summit, reiterating his position that the central bank will seek to navigate a "narrow path."

title: China's stimulus could focus on its 'dire' property sector. Here's what economists expect
description: Economists expect China's stimulus package to focus on the property sector amid continued weak economic data.

title: ‘These jobs can be respectable too’: Why youths in China are abandoning white-collar jobs for ‘light labor’
description: "Since we have accumulated a certain level of GDP and economic foundations … young people want to feel individualism," says one professor.

title: Binance U.S. clients have $2.2 billion 'at significant risk' after crypto exchange charged, SEC says
description: The latest filing from the SEC described founder Changpeng Zhao as a "foreign national" with open "disdain" for U.S. authority and law.
